channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Declares ‘Energy Emergency’ To Reverse Biden’s Assault On U.S. Power Production
item.description: At least six out of dozens of executive actions delivered by the newly inaugurated president on Monday focused on energy or environment.

item.title: They Gave Trump the Center, and He Took It
item.description: Out of touch and radical Democrats made Trump look like the normal one.

item.title: Leftists’ Proposal For 32-Hour Congressional Workweek Broadcasts Their Entitlement Mentality
item.description: The now-withdrawn proposal reinforces November’s election results and why Democrats face significant problems with working-class voters.

item.title: ‘Babygirl’ Doesn’t Get What’s So Powerful About Sex
item.description: There is no power in 'Babygirl,' superficial or otherwise, and it leaves the viewer deeply dissatisfied.

item.title: On College Football’s Biggest Night, Everyone Agrees Jesus Christ Is The Real MVP
item.description: During Monday night's College Football National Championship, players on both teams took the time to praise and glorify Jesus Christ.

item.title: Trump admin hits back as ACLU launches lawsuit on birthright citizenship: ‘Ready to face them’
item.description: The Trump administration is pushing back against what it says is the "Left's resistance" after a legal challenge filed late Monday by the ACLU.

item.title: Trump fires four Biden officials, promises to ax 'many more'
item.description: President Trump kept his Day 1 actions going after midnight Monday by firing four presidential appointees from the Biden administration.

item.title: Rubio sworn in as secretary of state, vows to promote 'peace through strength'
item.description: Marco Rubio was sworn in as secretary of state on Tuesday, making him the first of President Trump's Cabinet picks to take office.

item.title: SCOTUS Should Affirm Parents’ Right to Opt Out of Gender Ideology in Public Schools
item.description: Montgomery County parents have asked the Supreme Court to secure their right to protect their children from radical curricula. The Court should agree.

item.title: A Trump Inaugural Speech for a Trump Presidency
item.description: The address was another sign that the newly sworn-in president intends to govern the way he ran.

item.title: Joe Biden’s Final Corrupt Acts
item.description: History will not be kind to the 46th president.

item.title: Elon Musk faces criticism after appearing to make two Nazi-style salutes at Trump event
item.description: Billionaire tech mogul Elon Musk is facing sharp criticism after he appeared to make two Nazi-style salutes Monday at an inauguration event.

item.title: Biden’s Parting Protectionist Folly
item.description: Now ex-president Biden’s decision to block the sale of U.S. Steel to a Japanese company is unjustifiable.
